scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev
scripts.bump:dev: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.devDependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $p | ((.devDependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.bump:prod: if [ `cat package.json | jq -r '.dependencies | length'` -ne 0 ]; then npm install --save-exact $(cat package.json | jq -r '(.pinDependencies // {}) as $p | ((.dependencies // {}) | keys) | map(. + "@" + ($p[.] // ["latest"])[0]) | .[]'); fi
scripts.prepare: npm run prepare:abort-controller-es5 && npm run prepare:markdown-it-attrs-es5 && npm run prepare:p-defer-es5
scripts.prepare:abort-controller-es5: cd .. && cd .. && cd node_modules && cd abort-controller-es5 && npm run postinstall
scripts.prepare:markdown-it-attrs-es5: cd .. && cd .. && cd node_modules && cd markdown-it-attrs-es5 && npm run postinstall
scripts.prepare:p-defer-es5: cd .. && cd .. && cd node_modules && cd p-defer-es5 && npm run postinstall
